Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

Distributing Miles with Win16 Applications

Discussion

To distribute an application that uses Miles, you must include the Miles DLL (MSS16.DLL) in the same directory as your application, and you must copy the all of the other files in the \redist\win16 directory to a directory accessible by your application at run-time.

Do not place the MSS16.DLL in the Windows or the Windows System directories! The MSS16.DLL must be placed in your application directory! The Miles DLL will refuse to be loaded from a system directory.
